snippet.title: Pixelwoods: Coloring & Decor - Official trailer
snippet.description:
Pixelwoods is a new color by number game! We offer much more than just a coloring book in a cute pixel art style. We have great characters to follow, a mysterious mansion to renovate and redecor, and an exciting story to tell!

Ellie's parents disappeared when she was just a little kid. Now, many years later, the young artist comes back home to unravel the mystery of their disappearance, restore their mansion, get acquainted with the magic world of Pixelwoods and simply to have fun!

What’s in there:

● Nice and relaxing coloring game with paint by number gameplay
● Pleasant pixel graphics
● Captivating story with mystic, detective and comedy elements
● Cozy atmosphere, happy colors and a gallery of touching characters
● Thousands of unique pictures to color
● Lots of decor and home design options
● …and much more!

Help Ellie settle in, make friends, chase away enemies, and find out WHAT really happened to her parents!

Welcome to Pixelwoods!

Follow us!
Facebook: m.facebook.com/Pixelwoodsthegame
Instagram: www.instagram.com/pixelwoodsgame/

#coloringbook #pixelart #colorbynumber
